alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 12:01AM CDT until May 07 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jefferson County in southeastern Iowa... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1201 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brookville, or near Fairfield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Maharishi Vedic City, Jefferson County Fairgrounds, Jefferson County Park and Fairfield Municipal Airport around 1210 AM CDT. Fairfield around 1215 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Beckwith, Perlee, Lockridge, Salina and Glasgow. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
